description.value:
Allows direct interfacing with Cogitators, and +10 to Tech-Use Tests made with such systems. Provides +2 to Initiative Rolls. Can be linked to one piece of technology on user's person that possesses some kind of interface connector as a Full Action, in so doing provides +20 to Tech-Use tests to use this device.

Requirements

Requires Mechanicus Implants to use.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
